attributes.action: do something about people that dont have children that park in parent and child parking spaces!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a mother of two young boys it really annoys me (and many others) when i cant get a parent and child space because someone is being far to lazy to use a "normal" parking space. If you have no child with you, you should NOT BE ALLOWED TO PARK IN THE SPACES THAT HAVE BEEN PUT THERE FOR PARENTS AND THEIR CHILDREN!
